name: Madagascar 3 & The Croods: COMBO PACK
description: 2 full games in 1 pack! This combo pack contains the full versions of both Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted and The Croods: Prehistoric Party! It is loaded with action and adventure featuring your favorite DreamWorks Animation characters and is sure to provide hours of fun for kids of all ages! In Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted, adventure across Europe as Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Gloria the Hippo and Melman the Giraffe while you find a way home under the perfect cover: a traveling circus. The Croods: Prehistoric Party! combines the ultimate fun of a family party game with Croods-style action as you journey through 30 unique and addictive mini-games!
